title: UAT Feedback - Change Custom language as a required field from a hard error to an override warning for clubs and BOC
custom_steps:
- If Custom Language is selected, and left blank, show an override error instead of a hard error
- Implement for all 3 contract types

title: UAT feedback: Update rule 5.41 - Check for Major League Base Salary  instead of all Major League Terms
custom_steps:
Current business rule:
If Contract is in preliminary state, and if Addendum B of contract contains major league terms, but not minor league assignment salary, then the club and BOC user should receive an override-able warning.

Change to:
If **Addendum B contains "Major League Base Salary" clause** but not minor league assignment salary, then the club and BOC user should receive an override-able warning.
Updated warning: 
The contract that you are about to submit contains a Major League Base Salary but does not contain a Minor League Assignment Salary. 
Help text: Pursuant to Attachment 24 of the Basic Agreement, without including a Minor League Assignment Salary in this contract you may not be able to include a "split" salary in the Major League contract if you later select this player to the Major League roster

title: UAT Feedback: For intl contracts, when checking if the player will be 17, check against the contract year
custom_steps: Modify rule 5.18. If Beginning in Year is set to following year, then check if player will be 17 before Sept 1 of the following year

title: UAT feedback: Change to contract terms rule to be within 24 hours and turn off 2 day check
custom_steps:
**AC**
- Bus rule 5.13 should be changed from 2 days to 1 day. Updated error message "Contract terms must be submitted within 24 hours of Terms Agreed Upon Date". Override for club and BOC
- Bus rule 5.14 should be turned off completely (this is the rule where contact should be submitted within 2 days of Signing date)
- If this rule check is run subsequently for BOC and clubs, always compare against the Terms Submitted date and Terms agreed upon date, not the current date.
- Rule should be updated for all 3 contract types

title: As a Club, I want to enter the Mexican Assignment agreement amounts into a player's 1st yr intl and non 1st yr contract
custom_steps:
**Wireframe:**
http://f2j41d.axshare.com/#p=mexican_assignment_agreement

**AC**
- For 1st yr international contracts and Non 1st yr contracts, both Club and BOC users have access to a new section called "Mexican Assignment Agreement"
- It is always hidden behind the "Add Section" button by default and does not appear on the screen
- If added, it is ordered right after Addendum A but before Addendum B. It can be toggled off or removed from the contact after adding.
- The section has 2 fields "Assignment Fee" and "Portion of Fee passed to Player"
- Both fields are required, have red asterisks and trigger required field warnings if not populated
-  Both fields are $ fields only accept positive number values. Commas should be auto-inserted
- This section can be saved to the contract like all other sections. If added and toggled to no, it should be removed once contract reaches Terms Submitted
- Dave to document how this info will be ETL'd back to ebis 1 to make the signing bonus utility work?

Note
- No impact to printed contract

title: As a Club, I want to be warned if 1st yr international contract will result in exceeding Signing Bonus pool
custom_steps:
**AC**
- Bus rule 5.56
- This is an onSubmit rule and must be run on all state changes where onSubmit rules are run for both Club and BOC
- Override for both club and BOC
- Only applies to 1st yr intl contracts

Rule:
If the Contract has any one or more of the following sections included
- Signing Bonus Clause (with or without visa)
- Dual Sport (with or without visa)
- Mexican AA section
 
Then add the Total amount in the Signing Bonus clause / Dual Sport Bonus with the "Portion of Fee passed to player" in the Mex AA. If the total is less than $10,000, then don't show error.
 
If the total is higher than 10k, add this total to the "Total Signing Bonuses" value from Intl Signing bonus utility. If a club has exceed or will exceed its Signing Bonus pool, then show error.
 
Warning:
[Org] has exceeded or will exceed its Signing Bonus Pool for this signing period. Please contact BOC.

title: As a Club, I want to be warned if I'm within 10% of reaching my signing bonus pool limit when signing a 1st yr intl contract
custom_steps:
**AC**
- Bus rule 5.57
- This is an onSubmit rule and must be run on all state changes where onSubmit rules are run for both Club and BOC
- Override for both club and BOC
- Only applies to 1st yr intl contracts

Rule:
If the Contract has any one or more of the following sections included
- Signing Bonus Clause (with or without visa)
- Dual Sport (with or without visa)
- Mexican AA section
 
Then add the Total amount in the Signing Bonus clause / Dual Sport Bonus with the "Portion of Fee passed to player" in the Mex AA. If the total is less than $10,000, then don't show error.
 
If the total is higher than 10k, add this total to the "Total Signing Bonuses" value from Intl Signing bonus utility. If a club is within 10% of reaching it's Signing Bonus pool but not exceeding it, then show error.
 
 
Error:
[ORG] is within 10% of reaching its Signing Bonus Pool for this signing period. Current total: $[Value of Total Signing Bonuses including this contract], Signing Bonus Pool: $[Pool value]

title: As a club, I want to be stopped from signing an intl 1st yr contract that violates penalty restrictions from exceeding Signing Bonus Pools in previous years.
custom_steps:
**AC**
- Bus rule 5.58
- This is an onSubmit rule and must be run on all state changes where onSubmit rules are run for both Club and BOC
- Hard error for Club, Override for BOC
- Only applies to 1st yr intl contracts

Rule:
If a club has incurred penalties in previous years from the international Signing Bonus utility, and the contract is within the penalty signing period and has a signing bonus (or/and) Mex AA value that is higher than allowed, then show error
 
Hard error for Club and  override for BOC
 
Note that Signing Periods begin approx July 2nd (system values: International Signing Period begins) and end approx June 15th (system values: Day before International Signing Closed Period Start) of the following year
 
Error:
[ORG] has incurred a penalty for exceeding the Signing Bonus Pool and may not sign a player for over [$300,000 / $500,000].
